Body:
self._do_memory_test(
    """
            <%namespace name="x">
                <%def name="a()">
                    <%
                        x = 5
                    %>
                    this is x: ${x}
                </%def>
            </%namespace>

            ${x.a()}

    """
    , 'this is x: 5', filters=flatten_result)
